claims.object: Diagrammatic representation of an electrical circuit

surface_layer.definition: A visual representation of an electrical circuit using symbols and lines.

deep_layer.mechanism: Electrical schematics use standardized symbols to represent components and connections, allowing engineers to understand the circuit's operation.
deep_layer.origin: Evolved from early circuit diagrams to a standardized form for communication and documentation.
